extendedInfo.description: Have fun while you improve your game playing the most realistic craps simulation on the market.  Test your strategies using the unique strategy  performance dashboard. Realistic graphics and professional stickman calls make this an excellent and fun preparation for playing in a real casino.  The betting advisor will ensure that you never get rounded down or put the wrong bets in the wrong place at the wrong time.  The game statistics tell you how much you are winning or losing on every roll, every hand, and every simulated casino hour.  Play Craps Trainer Pro and you will know exactly what you are doing when you get to the table.We are also looking for testers for new releases email us at appmaster@e7systems.com with "Craps Trainer Pro Tester" as the subject line.  Must be using Gmail.Know issue:Android 3.x devices unable to load menu.  Statistics can be accessed by tapping the dealers chipbox.

reviews.title: I approve!
reviews.comment: I have been searching for two years for a craps game with some decent graphics and simple playing. This is both and more. Definitely recommended!
reviews.author: Morgan Elliott

reviews.title: Pretty good, needs some tweaks
reviews.comment: I\'ve run into a bug a few times after hitting the point where the pass line bet becomes part of the odds bet placed on next point set,leaving only an odds bet. Seems to happen when the second point is 6. If you then attempt to remove the bet before the point hits or a 7 comes,the entire amount is removed and you cannot continue. The game correctly won\'t let you add a pass line bet when a point is already established,but also won\'t let you roll even if you had other bets up. More to add,but out of space.
reviews.author: Jeff B.

reviews.title: Not bad, best craps app hands down!
reviews.comment: One problem, holding you from 5 stars. you can collect your passline bet after an point has been established. If you try to put it back it says \"you can\'t add to the passline\". If you try to play without it says \"player must establish a pass line bet\" help!
reviews.author: dietrick holliday

reviews.title: Re-review
reviews.comment: The odds on this game are messed up. I have never seen more 7s than any other craps game I have played and that includes at the casino.  I rolled 7, 7\'s in a row, then came out on a 6 and on my second roll hit a 7. I haven\'t once rolled more than 5 times toward my point without hitting a 7. Not once. In fact you\'ll be lucky to get 4 rolls toward your point before a 7 lands. THIS APP SHOULD BE CALLED BLOWS. Cuz crap is to kind.
reviews.author: Tim Bishop

reviews.title: Ok craps game. Needs work
reviews.comment: Good simulation overall but nothing really stands out. Could use custom user-defined betting amounts.  This will solve repetitive dragging and dropping chips and streamline gameplay. Also, the slider bar for setting money is annoying. It is imprecise.  Should just add direct text input from keyboard. For example i try to set starting money to 200 but cant ever make the slider stay on 200 i always end up with an odd number a little more or less than 200.
reviews.author: Dang Huynh

reviews.title: Good app, one tragic flaw
reviews.comment: Updated review: this game is basically unplayable for me because of the amount of 7s that get rolled. Want to really like it, but I can\'t get more than 2 rolls past the point without a 7 popping up.   The controls are a little difficult, the bet placement needs to be the whole zones, particularly on odds bets. Nicely done, just need to fix logic and tweak interface.
reviews.author: Luke Irvin

reviews.title: Not bad. Could be SIGNIFICANTLY better..,
reviews.comment: Would absolutely love a \"Repeat Last Bet\" button. It\'s a pain and bore to drag chips onto a game who\'s touch sensitivity is below par.
reviews.author: Courtney Jeffery

reviews.title: Great Trainer!
reviews.comment: Very nice app to learn the game. Now I have a good understanding of the different bets, odds, etc.
reviews.author: Ramon Morales

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Cannot figure out how to reset bakroll to what i want.  Defaults to $1000.
reviews.author: mike dion

reviews.title: Issue with bugs
reviews.comment: Pass line bug with odds. Please fix
reviews.author: Jack Wang

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I have been wanting to learn craps for quite some time and these guys have provided EXACTLY what I was looking for including the voice of the dealer. Please keep up the great work!
reviews.author: Anthony Stafford

reviews.title: Very good craps app for Android !
reviews.author: Chris Vitalos

reviews.title: Great App!!!
reviews.comment: I never knew how to play craps but after learning with this app I feel like I know everything..
reviews.author: Jason C.

reviews.title: Best craps I\'ve played on mobile.
reviews.comment: I only wish you could choose how much money to start with. Instead they start you off with $1000, which is not what i would go gamble with.
reviews.author: John A

reviews.title: Best there is!
reviews.comment: This app is perfect for practicing and developing strategies. Thank you developers. You rock!
reviews.author: ryan cranston

reviews.comment: Good trainer but needs work. The pass line odds are supposed to be off. Once the point is made you should remove the pass line odds. You are not supposed to get paid pass line odds on a 7 or 11. You should also have a clear all option.
reviews.author: Paul White
